author: Constance Urdang
text: Was a double line of orphans in blue smocks
Under the smoky eye of winter.
It is possible to envy them;
The picture of which they formed a part
In shades of blue and smoke
And the dull brick red of the asylum walls;
How orderly and tranquil the effect
Of the wintry ranks of children
title: Aesthetics of the Asylum
